select dp.`id`, dp.`uuid`, dp.`project_name`, dp.`visit_level`, dp.`is_share`, dp.`tags`, dp.`created_at`, dp.`creator_user_id`, dp.`creator_nickname`, dp.`updated_at`, dp.`updator_user_id`, dp.`updator_nickname`, dp.`deleted`, dp.`remark`, ifnull(max(dpm.`role`), 1) as `role` from doc_project dp left join doc_project_member dpm on dpm.doc_project_id = dp.id and dpm.deleted = 0 and dpm.`member_user_id` = #{user.userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
dp.deleted = 0 and ( dp.`visit_level` = 2 or dpm.`id` is not null )
and ( dp.`project_name` like concat('%', #{form.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') or exists ( select dpt.id from doc_project_tag dpt where dpt.doc_project_id = dp.`id` and dpt.deleted = 0 and dpt.tag_name like concat('%', #{form.keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, '%') ) )
group by dp.id
having `role` in
#{role,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by dp.updated_at desc, dp.id desc
